message:
Dear HR Team,

We would like to inform you that a new job applicant has successfully registered on the system.

Applicant Details:

  • Name: {{ doc.applicant_name }}
  • Email: {{ doc.email_id }}
  • Phone: {{ doc.phone_number }}
  • Position Applied For: {{ doc.job_title }}

Best regards,
{{ doc.custom_company }}
name: Job Applicant Registration Mail
subject: New Job Applicant Registered: {{ doc.applicant_name }}
